TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Takidis, title = Takidis, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takidis} }

S.FORM: == Takidis == u sulit nu Hulam: 德其里部落 i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Takidis. u kasalumaluma' nu Takidis sa, 157 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 371 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 212 ku tademaw, pakalatu 57%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 159 ku tademaw, pakalatu 43%. u kasabinacadan, 人口數有出入. i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Lupakatj. u kasalumaluma' nu Lupakatj sa, 220 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 484 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 250 ku tademaw, pakalatu 52%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 234 ku tademaw, pakalatu 48%. u asip nu tademaw u kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 48%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, Puyuma 1%, zumazuma 1%. u Pangcah (Amis) a niyazu' u Pangcah (Amis) a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Pangcah (Amis) a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitung a kuwan, caay katuud ku Sakizaya. inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini mueneng. izaw tu hakya, caayhenay pasumad tu ngangan nu cidekay. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad

== Takidis == o solit no Holam: 德其里部落 i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Takidis. o kasalomaloma' no Takidis sa, 157 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 371 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 212 ko tademaw, pakalato 57%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 159 ko tademaw, pakalato 43%. o kasabinacadan, 人口數有出入. i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Lopakatj. o kasalomaloma' no Lopakatj sa, 220 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 484 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 250 ko tademaw, pakalato 52%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 234 ko tademaw, pakalato 48%. o asip no tademaw o kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 48%, Pangcah(Amis) 1%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, Poyoma 1%, zomazoma 1%. o Pangcah (Amis) a niyazo' o Pangcah (Amis) a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Pangcah (Amis) a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitong a kowan, caay katood ko Sakizaya. inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini moeneng. izaw to hakya, caayhenay pasomad to ngangan no cidekay. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad
